graph.original_query: I want a basic report on the features for Mahindra XUV 3XO, and you must also include a detailed analysis of the luxury and safety features.

It is available with Manual & Automatic transmission.Depending upon the variant and fuel type the XUV 3XO has a mileage of 17.96 to 20.6 kmpl. The XUV 3XO is a 5 seater 3 cylinder car and has length of 3990 mm, width of 1821 mm and a wheelbase of 2600. Level 2 ADAS with features such as forward collision warning, adaptive cruise control. 1.2-litre turbo-petrol engine makes 130PS/230Nm most powerful in its class. What is the mileage of the Mahindra XUV 3XO? The XUV 3XO offers an ARAI-certified mileage of up to 21.2 km/l for diesel variants and up to 20.1 km/l for petrol variants, depending on the transmission and engine type. Q. What engine options are available in the Mahindra XUV 3XO? The XUV 3XO is available with three engine options: a 1.2L turbo-petrol (110 bhp, 200 Nm), a 1.2L TGDi turbo-petrol (130 bhp, 230 Nm), and a 1.5L turbo-diesel (115 bhp, 300 Nm). Q. nodes.description: Retrieve information about the general features of Mahindra XUV 3XO.
nodes.agent_prompt: Retrieve a comprehensive list of the standard features for the Mahindra XUV 3XO from reliable sources such as the manufacturer's website, reputable automotive review sites, and automotive news publications. Focus on aspects such as engine specifications, dimensions, technology features, infotainment system, and any notable standard equipment.

What engine options are available in the Mahindra XUV 3XO? nodes.description: Retrieve information about the luxury features of Mahindra XUV 3XO.
nodes.agent_prompt: Gather detailed information about the luxury features offered in the Mahindra XUV 3XO. This includes premium interior materials (e.g., leather seats, wood trim), advanced infotainment features (e.g., large touchscreen displays, premium sound systems), comfort features (e.g., ventilated seats, massage function), and any other features that enhance the vehicle's luxury appeal. Use reliable sources such as the manufacturer's website, automotive reviews, and comparison articles.

nodes.description: Retrieve information about the safety features of Mahindra XUV 3XO.
nodes.agent_prompt: Collect comprehensive data on the safety features included in the Mahindra XUV 3XO. This should include active safety systems (e.g., adaptive cruise control, lane departure warning, automatic emergency braking), passive safety features (e.g., airbags, seatbelt pretensioners), and any available safety ratings from reputable organizations like Global NCAP or Euro NCAP. Prioritize information from the manufacturer's website, official safety reports, and trusted automotive news sources.

nodes.description: Analyze the collected features, luxury features, and safety features of Mahindra XUV 3XO.
nodes.agent_prompt: Analyze the data collected on the Mahindra XUV 3XO's features (T001), luxury features (T002), and safety features (T003). Synthesize this information to identify key selling points, potential advantages over competitors, and any notable drawbacks. Provide a detailed comparison of the features in each category, highlighting the most significant aspects of each. Focus on presenting a balanced view that covers both the strengths and weaknesses of the vehicle in terms of features, luxury, and safety.

nodes.description: Format the analysis into a well-structured report.
nodes.agent_prompt: Create a comprehensive report based on the analysis of the Mahindra XUV 3XO's features (T004). The report should include an introduction, sections for general features, luxury features, and safety features, and a conclusion. Use clear and concise language. Format the report with headings, subheadings, bullet points, and tables to enhance readability. Ensure that the report is suitable for executive-level review and provides a balanced and informative overview of the vehicle's key attributes. Please prioritize the safety features.
